description: This type represents a VNF indicator value change notification.

id.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

notificationType.description: Discriminator for the different notification types. Shall be set to "VnfIndicatorValueChangeNotification" for this notification type.

subscriptionId.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

timeStamp.description: Date-time stamp.  Representation: String formatted according to IETF RFC 3339.

vnfIndicatorId.description: An identifier that is unique within a VNF descriptor.

name.description: Human readable name of the VNF indicator. Shall be present if defined in the VNFD.

value.description: Provides the value of the VNF indicator. The value format is defined in the VNFD.

vnfInstanceId.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

_links.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

vnfInstance.description: This type represents a link to a resource.

subscription.description: This type represents a link to a resource.
